name: Wii and GameCube Resource Archive
summary: Learn about .RARC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Several Wii and GameCube games store game assets and associated metadata in compressed RARC archives. Most notably, Super Mario Galaxy and Super Mario Galaxy 2 both use RARC files.

In some cases, Wii and GameCube games instead store their assets in slightly-modified RARC files. For example, Super Mario Sunshine stores assets in RARC files that are compressed using Yaz0 compression. These RARC files use the .SZS extension, to denote that they are not standard RARC files.
NOTE: RARC files also commonly use the .ARC extension.

description: A RARC file is an asset archive used by a Nintendo Wii or GameCube video game. It contains 3D models, images, and other resources used to show game characters, objects, and levels. Game modders sometimes extract, modify, and repackage RARC files' contents to modify a game's gameplay.

instructions: You can open a RARC file with Wiimms SZS Tools, ARCTool, or Wexos's Toolbox. These programs allow you to extract assets from, add assets to, and repackage RARC files.
